name: Fair n Square
description:
The ultimate square shooter

Try out your skills in Fair n Square, and see how far you can make it! Buy upgrades, but at the cost of your health. Do you want to stack up on upgrades, and try to dodge every bullet, or play it safe with only a few upgrades?

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump, MOUSE to aim and shoot

Music, art and code done by DaniDev. There will be a video about the process on my My Youtube Channel!

Rate my game here on LD here!

Changelog:

29.04.2019

Fixed a bug where larger bullets woudn't destroy smaller bullets
Fixed a bug with the sword where it spawned bullets instead of sword "slashes"
Fixed a bug where too many enemies would appear at the same time

03.05.2019

Added performance mode since some people had issue with fps
